title: Beautiful Imposter
description: Hardworking, devoted Jessica races home to spend an unexpected take-five with her husband Byron, but the gut-wrenching scene she finds on the bedroom floor knocks the wind out of her. Betrayed, she almost demands divorce. As the evening unfolds, she takes a chance on love. For now. Tomorrow? Time, it is said, can heal all wounds. Can it really . . . heal all wounds?Mature language and scenes.
author: Alex Shippe
